unittitle_ssm: New York State National Guard, 101st Cavalry Regiment records
abstract_ssm: This collection contains records of the New York State National Guard 101st Cavalry Regiment for the period 1940 to 1957, including payroll and discharge records as well as newsletters and membership lists of the Regiment's veteran organizations, the American Legion Post No. 296 and the Cavalry Club.
corpname_ssm: American Legion. Post No. 296 (Brooklyn, New York, N.Y.)
